name: streamdevs-webhook
description: An HTTP Webhook to forward GitHub events to StreamLabs

STREAMLABS_TOKEN.description: A token to use the StreamLabs API.

TWITCH_BOT_NAME.description: The account (username) that the chatbot uses to send chat messages.

TWITCH_BOT_CHANNEL.description: The Twitch channel name where you want to run the bot.

NOTIFY_CHECK_RUNS_FOR.description: Comma-separated list of branches to notify Check Runs for. Leave empty to notify for any branch
